languages.text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} unleashes a terrifying scream, drawing the attention of their enemies and becoming a {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for any enemy who fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Воин{/g} издает клич, чтобы привлечь внимание противников, и становится {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}приоритетной целью{/g} для каждого противника, который провалит проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g}.

traits.locale_text: After killing an enemy or dealing a Critical Hit with a melee attack, the Fighter screams at their enemies and becomes a priority target for those who fail a Willpower Test.

The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} unleashes a terrifying scream, drawing the attention of their enemies and becoming a {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for any enemy who fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}战士{/g}发出怒吼，吸引周围敌人的注意力。未能通过{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}的敌人会将战士视为{g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}优先目标{/g}。

traits.locale_text: 战士发出怒吼，吸引周围敌人的注意力。未能通过{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}的敌人会将战士视为{g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}优先目标{/g}。

languages.text: El {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}guerrero{/g} grita a sus enemigos para llamar su atención y se convierte en {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}objetivo prioritario{/g} de todo enemigo que falle una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g}.

languages.text: Der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Krieger{/g} schreit seine Feinde an, um ihre Aufmerksamkeit zu erregen, und wird zu einem {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}Prioritätsziel{/g} eines jeden Feindes, dem eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} misslingt.

traits.locale_text: Der Krieger schreit seine Feinde an, um ihre Aufmerksamkeit zu erregen, und wird zu einem {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}Prioritätsziel{/g} eines jeden Feindes, dem eine {g|Encyclopedia:Test}Probe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} misslingt.

languages.text: Le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Combattant{/g} crie sur ses ennemis pour attirer leur attention et devient la {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}cible prioritaire{/g} de tout ennemi qui échoue à un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} lié à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force Mentale{/g}.
